page.title: 08FARM MACHINERY
page.content:
FARM MACHINERY HAS CHANGED GREATLY SINCE THE START OF THE{20th CENTURY. HORSES HAVE GONE IN FAVOUR OF MECHANIZED TRACTORS WHICH HAVE COME A LONG WAY FROM THE EXPOSED CRUDE(BUT RELIABLE) EARLY TYPES TO THE FULLY UPHOLSTERED CABBED ONES OF TODAY WHICH HAVE HEATING AND A C.B. RADIO. ON MARSHLAND{CATERPILLAR TRACKS}ARE SUBSTITUTED FOR WHEELS. MACHINES LIKE THE{COMBINED HARVESTER}HAVE COME DOWN IN SIZE FROM 2 HUGE MACHINES TO 1 COMPACT MACHINE. NOWADAYS A FIELD IS PLOUGHED, CULTIVATED,HARROWED AND SEEDED IN 1 DAY USING SPECIALISED MACHINERY. MANY FURROWED PLOUGHED MAKE LIGHT WORK OF THE LARGE OPEN FIELDS. {HYDRAULICS}ARE A GREAT HELP TO THE FARMER.
{A. STEVENS {G. TOONE
